name: Fhenimore
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Amphibious
text: Fhenimore can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: Fhenimore has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: Fhenimore's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: command, create or destroy water
3/day each: control water, darkness, water breathing, water walk
1/day each: call lightning, Evard's black tentacles

action.name: Thunderous Touch
text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 27 (5d10) thunder damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Fhenimore can attack once with her bite attack and once with Thunderous Touch.

spells: command, create or destroy water, control water, darkness, water breathing, water walk, call lightning, Evard's black tentacles
